content.question: Which of the following is an example of operant conditioning?

choices.label: Michelle learns how to play basketball by observing and imitating her older brother playing basketball.
After playing golf for more than ten years, Phil no longer needs to think consciously about which golf club to use on different parts of the course.
When he was twelve years old, Craig ate a hot dog and got extremely sick. As an adult, he still feels nauseous at the sight of a hot dog.
When Katy receives poor grades on her report card, her father takes away her cell phone. Then Katy’s grades start to improve.

content.answer: When Katy receives poor grades on her report card, her father takes away her cell phone. Then Katy’s grades start to improve.
